test_cases.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication for a New Account
steps: Log in to the application with an existing account.
Add a new phone number or email address for two-factor authentication.
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the Two-Factor Authentication page with a verification code sent via SMS or authenticator app.

test_cases.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication for an Existing Account
steps: Log in to the application with an existing account.
Add a new phone number or email address for two-factor authentication.
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the Two-Factor Authentication page with a verification code sent via SMS or authenticator app.

test_cases.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication for an Existing Account (Error Scenario)
steps: Log in to the application with an existing account.
Add a new phone number or email address for two-factor authentication.
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the Two-Factor Authentication page with an error message indicating that the verification code was not sent correctly.

test_cases.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication for a New Account (Boundary Scenario)
steps: Log in to the application with an existing account.
Add a new phone number or email address for two-factor authentication.
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the Two-Factor Authentication page with a verification code sent via SMS or authenticator app, but the account creation process is blocked due to an error.
